pages.text: Legends tell of a mysterious mineral, $(bold)one which known to be about as common as redstone$(). It has been dubbed by many as "$(5)arcanum minerale$()", or "$(italic)mysterious mineral$()" in Latin. It is told to $(bold)have mysterious properties which could be harnessed$(); the glowing crystal, $(bold)if used right, could be used to do nearly anything$().
$(italic)$(5)Arcanum Minerale$()$(italic) in the wild. Rumor says it's the $(6)Prima Materia$()$(italic), however those claims are baseless.$()

pages.title: Basic Smelting
pages.text: For those with the $(6)Silk Touch$() enchantment, raw $(5)Arcanum Minerale$() can be smelted in a regular furnace to create a crystal. However, this has less yield than simply mining the raw crystal. It is recommended to mine the raw crystal with a tool which has some form of the $(9)Fortune$() enchantment as it will give a greater yield.

pages.title: Pure Arcanum Minerale
pages.text: This is pure $(5)Arcanum Minerale$(), or at least the purest it can get. Its potential is $(bold)nearly infinite$(). While it is quite common, it has been found that it is $(bold)somewhat hard to harness without extra components or ways to increase its power$().
